'''1.19.3 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.19.3-rc2''' in the launcher) is the second release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.19.3]], released on December 5, 2022,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-3-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.19.3 Release Candidate 2|December 5, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.3 Release Candidate 2
|;previous
|258251|Slots (like %s) in translations no longer ignore missing elements in <code>with</code>.
|258256|Cannot join a LAN world while offline.
}}</onlyinclude>
